desc.cn: MoonBit 是一个用于云计算和边缘计算的 WebAssembly 端到端的编程语言工具链
desc.en: MoonBit is an end-to-end programming language toolchain for cloud and edge computing using WebAssembly

win/powershell.cmd: x pwsh Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser; irm https://cli.moonbitlang.com/install/powershell.ps1 | iex
